page.title: 10WAKEFIELD PRISON Page 2.
page.content: >>>>>>{continued from previous page. Each wing is supervised by an Assistant Governor and Principal Officer responsible for the good order and welfare of prisoners to the Governor and Deputy Governor. Administrative officials deal with the day-to-day organisation and operational aspects of the prison which embrace catering, laundry, medical, records, punishment and other functions on behalf of the four main wings. In total some 400 uniformed staff and 10 Governor grades are responsible for the daily running of the prison, assisted by a further 130 civilian personnel responsible to the Governor for administrative, clerical, chaplaincy,instructional, educational, medical, welfare, psychological, works/buildings, and maintenance functions.
